content:
As discussed on the 2/6 CDS WG call, I have prepared a block vote with the remaining STU comments (22).

The comments and proposed dispositions are available here.

These dispositions are based on the proposed CQL STU 1.4 content that we have been working on and reviewing over the past few calls, as well as discussions with submitters.

Please review and let me know if you'd like any of these comments pulled from the block vote for individual discussion.

We will consider this block vote on the next CDS WG call.
